data.text:
@RepCuellar In 1994, Ukraine gave up nuclear weapons in exchange for security guarantees from the US, GB, Russia, etc. Now Russia has violated them and has been bombarding our cities and killing civilians!
Help us to engage Russia to negotiation or at least give us airplanes!

@RepCuellar Also, 30% of the people in TX-28 live in poverty and you have done nothing to improve that in 15 year. But you sure have fundraisers in DC for special interests charging $5000 to attend. Que asco.

@RepCuellar Your words are empty when 15 years after you’ve had your position and Tejanos still don’t see any improvement. That’s because this job is only for yourself and you serve only right wing special interests. 

Vote Jessica Cisneros in May for TX-28.
